result.arabic_text: وَنَادَىٰٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ أَنۡ أَفِيضُواْ عَلَيۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ أَوۡ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُۚ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَرَّمَهُمَا عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
result.translation: Warri ibiddaa  warra jannataatti lallabu "Bishaan irraa yookiin waan Rabbiin isinii hire irraa nurratti dhangalaasaa" jedhu, "Dhugumatti, Rabbiin isaan lamaan kaafiroota irratti haraama taasiseera" jedhaniin.
